creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: cup raised on inverted conical foot; two bands of irregular rectangular cutouts on foot alternating with bands of incised wavy lines; incised wavy lines around outer lip of cup; steeply domed lid with incised orbiting lines and other waving lines around pull knob
medium: Stoneware with incised design of wavy lines
title: Pedestal dish with cover
